last_episode_to_air.name: Europe's Ice World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.

name: Winter's Hidden Wonders
overview: Winter pushes wildlife to the extreme. For some, it is a chance to thrive; for others, the only way to escape the icy hold of winter is to shut down every physical system. When spring finally comes, it is a time for celebration for those who managed to survive the most brutal of seasons.

episodes.name: America's Frozen Frontier
episodes.overview: The harsh elements of the Americas' winter push animals to their limits. Only the toughest and most resourceful survive.

episodes.name: Asia's Frozen Wilderness
episodes.overview: Winter's savage conditions are the ultimate test for Asia's wildlife. Only the most resilient and resourceful animals survive until spring.

episodes.name: Europe's Ice World
episodes.overview: Winter in Europe sees temperatures plummet to minus 40 degrees; wildlife pushed to the extreme. Animals here have little choice but to adapt or die.
